title: November 1: Pro-Israel Group Meeting
description: Test the candidate’s ability to navigate high-stakes endorsement offers that involve political and ethical trade-offs.

tasks.prompt: A Pro-Israel group offers conditional support. Participate in a voiced AI dialogue and decide whether to accept or decline the endorsement. If prompted, explain your reasoning.

narrator: A Pro-Israel group approaches with a conditional endorsement. Carefully weigh campaign advantages against moral and voter trust implications before responding.
readingSummary: Endorsements can bring legitimacy, funding, and momentum but may have controversial conditions.
Candidates must balance short-term political gain with long-term credibility and ethical consistency.

tasksDetails.prompt: Participate in a dialogue with the group and choose to accept or decline their endorsement. Explain your reasoning if asked.

sources: General Election November 1 – Pro-Israel Endorsement Scenario

outcome.description: CC, voter approval, and credibility adjust based on the candidate's decision. Performance demonstrates the ability to weigh short-term gains against long-term ethical and political consequences.
